name: nomatic-events
author: Brian D. Foster <bdfoster89@gmail.com> (https://github.com/bdfoster)
description: Fast, asynchronous, and regex-enabled event framework for Node.js

scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive test/**/*.test.js
scripts.coveralls: cross-env NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive test/**/*.test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
